Service Details: - Identifies unmet recreational needs for a child with disabilities, finds a similar existing activity or program and works to integrate the child into it- If there is no existing program, Kids In Action looks for a community leader to start a new program
Cost: Membership ; Annual $10 fee provides total program access.
Address & Map: 1720 Ethel St, #23Kelowna, BC     V1Y 2Y7View MapQuest Map
